name: LenTempV
short_description:
IMPORTANT: THIS IS ONLY FOR SOME VERYS SPECIFIC LEGACY TYPE OF LAPTOP AND LINUX DISTRIBUTIONS. IT IS ONLY FOR TRIAL PURPOSE, SO USE IT ON YOUR OWN RISK.
==============
The fans of some types of Lenovo PC cannot be controlled by linux properly. Sometimes the system temperature is quite high but the system cannot activate the fan due to some reason that I do not know. To be specific, I have a Lenovo SR210 and when I runs RedFlag Linux, then I frequently have a over heated machine. 

The short script monitorS the temperature of CPU and warn you when the system is overheated.

You can modify the code yourself, for example, change the critical level of temperature that suit you, and change the location of your ACPI


This project is moved from Google Codes. Was called "tempvision" at that time. But Google Codes is no longer supported by Google.......
summary: Monitor CPU temperature of some LEGACY Lenovo Laptops
